### Chart A

```{r}
chart_a = instacart |>
  group_by(department) |>
  summarise(total_order = n()) |>
  arrange(total_order) |>
  plot_ly(x = ~department, y = ~total_order, color = ~department, type = "bar", colors = "viridis")
chart_a
```
